name: SnakesandLadders
0:
”Alexa start snakes and ladders”
”Alexa open snakes and ladders and start new snakes and ladders game”
”Alexa, open snakes and ladders and play first turn”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snakes and ladders
des:
Classic snakes and ladders built in into an Alexa skill.

The goal of the game is to get to the square one hundred by rolling a dice.

You will be playing against Alexa, so may the odds be with you.

This skill does not require any special requirements.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
